page.title: 14A TYPICAL DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: IN THE MORNING I GET UP ABOUT 7.30 AND HAVE BREAKFAST WHICH IS USUALLY CORNFLAKES. I CATCH THE BUS ABOUT 8.35. WHEN WE ARRIVE AT SCHOOL WE WAIT ABOUT 20 MINUTES TILL THE BELL RINGS. WHEN WE GET IN WE USUALLY START WITH MATHS. WE USE THE SPMG TEXTBOOKS. BY THE TIME WE FINISH THAT, IT IS BREAK TIME. THEN WE DO LANGUAGE WORK. THIS MEANS WORD STUDY, SPELLING AND READING. FROM 12 UNTIL 1 O'CLOCK IS DINNER TIME. IN THE AFTERNOON WE CONTINUE WITH WORK IF IT ISN'T FINISHED. WE THEN HAVE A FREE CHOICE. FREE CHOICE MEANS USUALLY ENVIRONMENTAT STUDIES PROJECTS (HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY OR SCIENCE) OR WORK ON COMPUTERS. MY FAVOURITE PROJECT IS BASED ON THE FIGHTING FANTASY IDEAS. WE HAVE SPECIALIST TEACHERS WHO VISIT US AND HELP WITH ART, CRAFT AND MUSIC.
